projects.name: Kurdish Text-to-Speech
projects.description: A custom trained text-to-speech model used in our winning project 'Kurdish Sign Language Convertor' for the 2023 hackasuly Competition.

projects.name: Book Cover Generator
projects.description: A tool to generate a unique book covers for books utilizing large language models (Gemini API) and image generation (Stable Diffusion).

projects.name: Dolus
projects.description: A murder-mystery utilizing large language models to simulate the thought, emotion, and reaction of virtual characters.

projects.name: TetrisGo
projects.description: A rhythm game utilizing pose detection to make the player match their pose to the correct piece of a Tetris game with the beat of the music.

projects.name: Mirror Maze Simulation
projects.description: A mirror maze creation tool that allows you to design your own mirror maze and simulate how it will look using optical physics.

projects.name: Hologram Fan Simulation
projects.description: A visual simulation of a high-speed LED hologram fan to see how to program and design one myself.
